u: Used in balloons, deep sea diving & welding. Also used in very low temperature research.
sour: Found in natural gas deposits & in the air (5 parts per billion) Constantly lost to space; replenished by radioactive decay (alpha particles).
desc: Colourless, odourless gaseous nonmetallic element. Belongs to group 18 of the periodic table. Lowest boiling point of all elements and can only be solidified under pressure. Chemically inert, no known compounds. Discovered in the solar spectrum in 1868 by Lockyer.
disc: Sir William Ramsey, Nils Langet, P.T.Cleve
